minDistance.description: This entity must always be between maxDistance and minDistance.

maxDistance.description: This entity must always be between maxDistance and minDistance.

relativeSpeed.description: This entity must always be between maxDistance and minDistance.

centerDistance.description: If true, distance between entities is measured between centers. If false, it's measured between borders.

description: Makes the visibility of the parent entity depend on a given condition. When the condition is evaluated to true, the entity will be shown in screen and touchable.
